original_text: Each cart had four handles. There was one handle on each side, joined to the cart as one piece.
korean_text: 받침 수레 네 모퉁이에 어깨 같은 것 넷이 있는데 그 어깨는 받침 수레와 연결되었고

sentences.korean_translation: 각 수레에는 네 개의 손잡이가 있었다

sentences.original_text: There was one handle on each side
joined to the cart as one piece
